results.title: Tutorial: Deploy applications using GitOps - Azure Arc
results.description: Tutorial: Deploy applications using GitOps with ArgoCD This tutorial describes how to use GitOps in a Kubernetes cluster. GitOps with ArgoCD is enabled as a cluster extension in Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes clusters or Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters.  ...oymentArgoCD also supports other common file sources, such as Helm and Open Container.

results.title: Tutorial: Deploy applications using GitOps with Flux v2 - Azure Arc
results.description: Tutorial: Deploy applications by using GitOps with Flux v2 This tutorial describes how to use GitOps in a Kubernetes cluster. Consider alternatively trying out the new Microsoft GitOps ArgoCD extension. Argo CD is a popular open-source GitOps tool that provides a different set of features and capabilities compared to Flux v2. Prerequisites To.
